info.title: Template For Building HTML Lists
info.usage: For any ul, ol, or dl one or more lists.
info.heading: Heading wrapped in p element for non-dl lists
info.still more on heading: For dl set heading as list.items.titlename.
info.items usage: Items is an array of objects unique to each list item
info.more on items usage: For text only do list.items : {text : my text}
info.anchors usage: For anchors set list.wrap to: anchor
info.more on anchors: Set text and href in items array of objects
info.still more usage: For other wrappers set list.wrap to: tagname
info.nearly there: For no wrap (i.e. text only) remove list.wrap
info.finally: Remove this info when in use.

atts.text: Text or markup. Parsed as innerHTML.
atts.when-not-use: only list acceptable HTML or DOM attributes

heading: For a single ul or ol list (remove if no heading). Wrapped in p element when used.

atts.attributes: common to all list items else remove this atts

dt title 1 (dl only).text: text only but wrapped in anchor element if list.wrap is set to anchor
